content.text: This chapter covers materials, design, and installation of plumbing fixtures.
Water-operated devices not regularly used and plumbing fixtures that are not maintained shall be removed.
All plumbing fixtures shall meet the water efficiency standards set forth in this chapter and applicable regulations.
Water closets shall conform to ASME A112.19.2.
Water closets shall have a maximum water consumption of 1.6 gallons (6 L) per flush.
Urinals shall conform to the same performance standards as water closets.
Urinals shall consume no more than 1 gallon (3.8 L) per flush.
